name: Treasure hunter (itch) (kill4spika)
description:
Treasure Hunter is a hardcore runner where you control a Viking.

The game is in early release.

The goal at the moment is to reach the blacksmith.

Controll

The controls are quite simple with the Z key or the left mouse button to jump (if you press it there will be a double jump).

Bonuses

In addition to collecting coins, there are also bonuses that will help you reach your goal.

The shield will protect you from the spikes;

The feather will save you from falling;

Praise and criticism are accepted :) Music and sounds in progress. Have a good game!

The asset pack used in the game can be purchased here:
